metadata.title: CVE-2021-45085 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: XSS can occur in GNOME Web (aka Epiphany) before 40.4 and 41.x before 41.1 via an about: page, as demonstrated by ephy-about:overview when a user visits an XSS payload page often enough to place that page on the Most Visited list.

criterions.comment: epiphany-browser package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
